title: Game Crashed please reconnect bug
body: I've been placed in the low priority queue by leaverbuster because the game crashed... how do I repair this issue seeing as it wasn't my fault...

replies.body: It just said 'the game has crashed, please try to reconnect' and gave me the reconnect screen over and over until I got penalized. I performed troubleshooting as suggested in another thread (deleting some game files in the game folder etc and rebooting) and everything is working but Im in a really long queue now...

If this crash resulted in a bugsplat, then something like outdated drivers or bad game files may have failed to render the game.  I suggest going over the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) to help fix that up.  Test it out in a custom game first to prevent any further penalties.  I know it wasn't intentional, but leaves still causes negative experiences so [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) treats all leaves equally.  Hope that helps!
